fr.amap.commons.math.matrix

Class Mat4F

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.amap.commons.math.matrix.Mat4F

  • public class Mat4F
extends Object
    A single precision 4x4 matrix
    Author:
    Julien Heurtebize (julienhtbe@gmail.com)

                            float bottom,
                            float top,
                            float near,

        Constructs a square frustum by the given parameters, represents this frustum like a 4x4 matrix
        Parameters:
        left - The left limit
        right - The right limit
        bottom - The bottom limit
        top - The top limit
        near - The near limit
        far - The far limit
        Returns:
        The frustum 4x4 matrix

      • perspective

        public static Mat4F perspective(float fovy,
                                float aspect,
                                float near,
                                float far)
        Constructs and initialize a 4x4 single precision perspective matrix
        Parameters:
        fovy - The field of view
        aspect - The aspect ratio
        near - The near limit of the frustum
        far - The far limit of the frustum
        Returns:
        A perspective single precision 4x4 matrix

      • ortho

        public static Mat4F ortho(float left,
                          float right,
                          float bottom,
                          float top,
                          float near,
                          float far)

        Constructs and initialize a 4x4 single precision orthographic projection matrix.

        An orthographic matrix is represented by a rectangular volume.
        Parameters:
        left - The left limit
        right - The right limit
        bottom - The bottom limit
        top - The top limit
        near - The near limit
        far - The far limit
        Returns:
        An orthographic projection 4x4 matrix

      • lookAt

        public static Mat4F lookAt(Vec3F eye,
                           Vec3F center,
                           Vec3F up)
        Compute a view matrix from the world position of the camera (eye), a global up vector and a target point (the point we want to look at)
        Parameters:
        eye - The eye position as a 3d vector
        center - The target position as a 3d vector
        up - The up direction as a 3d vector
        Returns:
        a 4x4 single precision lookat matrix

        public static Mat4F transpose(Mat4F mat4F)
        Transpose a given 4x4 single precision matrix and return the result
        Parameters:
        mat4F - The 4x4 matrix to transpose
        Returns:
        The transposed matrix
